commit.message:
Rollup merge of #99704 - fee1-dead-contrib:add_self_tilde_const_trait, r=oli-obk

Add `Self: ~const Trait` to traits with `#[const_trait]`

r? `@oli-obk`

verification.payload:
tree 2d0dfcda55b7e1368252c8585ef2f982dc6543e3
parent 3b780fc2792c471c6fc1491e08d4523629ec222e
parent 4b7a348508645dc69ffc8729307e579377e0f3a2
author Yuki Okushi <jtitor@2k36.org> 1658916333 +0900
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1658916333 +0900

Rollup merge of #99704 - fee1-dead-contrib:add_self_tilde_const_trait, r=oli-obk

Add `Self: ~const Trait` to traits with `#[const_trait]`

r? `@oli-obk`

files.patch:
@@ -1,53 +1,29 @@

+error[E0277]: the trait bound `cross_crate::NonConst: ~const cross_crate::MyTrait` is not satisfied

+LL |     NonConst.func();
+   |              ^^^^ the trait `~const cross_crate::MyTrait` is not implemented for `cross_crate::NonConst`
+   |
+note: the trait `cross_crate::MyTrait` is implemented for `cross_crate::NonConst`, but that implementation is not `const`
+  --> $DIR/cross-crate.rs:17:14
+   |

+   |              ^^^^
+help: consider introducing a `where` clause, but there might be an alternative better way to express this requirement
